channel.title: Comments on: Job Opportunities in Ireland

item.title: By: Joe Scanlon
item.dc:creator: Joe Scanlon
item.description: We are not hiring :-) However - this is a good news post, and I just wanted to say thanks.
item.content:encoded:
We are not hiring
However – this is a good news post, and I just wanted to say thanks.

item.title: By: Eamonn Fallon
item.dc:creator: Eamonn Fallon
item.description:
Hey Fergus,
We are hiring over at Daft: Experienced PHP Developer and 2 business development roles.
http://www.daft.ie/content/jobs/index.daft
item.content:encoded:
Hey Fergus,

We are hiring over at Daft: Experienced PHP Developer and 2 business development roles.

http://www.daft.ie/content/jobs/index.daft
